reviewtext: I am a beginner to digital photography and this camera has me hooked. It is easy to learn, easy to use, and produces beautiful pictures. Congrats to Kodak for including the charger with batteries, and the regular batteries  so I was able to take pictures as soon as the camera arrived. Congrats also  to Amazon for having the best price I could find on the web. The software  works well but I wish Kodak had included the home version of Adobe instead  of the business version. This camera is a definite winner and I highly  recommend it to both the beginner and experienced photographer.
